Suite à la réunion du 12 Juillet entre PLU GB et CD il a été demandé à PLU de dimensionner les solution possibles pour monitor les stats de biospecimens et autre applications web (e.g. NoE)

# Description? Points forts Points faibles Isofonctionnel Temps
1 Install server awstats, copy log files and analyze log files manually. * solution rapid. * No log update Yes ~3 days
2 Use Rsync to copy log files from web application servers to awstats server,
edit daily cron job to analyze log files and do the log rotation 		* Log files transfer and log analysis is done automatically * Log files are transfered as plain text data no log curation or filter possible Yes 5 days
3 Install syslog-ng server on awstats server, and syslog-ng client on biospecimens.
Edit daily cron job to analyze log files and do the log rotation.
Edit ansible play book to deploy syslog-ng client 		* The syslog-ng server can be our centralize log server. This server can make us respect the data center log saving law.
* Log files can be parsed into structrued data (e.g. xml, json), can be applied to all kinds of log files 		* Take a long time to do Yes Hard to say, 10-15 days maybe
